long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My personal startpage - now available for everyone.

Like similar other startpages this instance shows weather information and up to eight favorite links. Unlike others it will also read content from selected sources and show it in a timeline. Supported sources are:
- Planet Debian
- Reddit
- Slashdot
- Tagesschau
- Twitter
- WoWhead

All settings can be customized (including personalized feeds for Reddit and Twitter).
